verses.verse: An Exuberant Declaration of Faith A Psalm of David. ([1]) The LORD is my light and my salvation; Whom shall I fear? The LORD is the strength of my life; Of whom shall I be afraid?
When the wicked came against me To (Ps. 14:4) eat up my flesh, My enemies and foes, They stumbled and fell.
(Ps. 3:6) Though an army may encamp against me, My heart shall not fear; Though war may rise against me, In this I will be confident.

(Ps. 26:8; 65:4) One thing I have desired of the LORD, That will I seek: That I may (Luke 2:37) dwell in the house of the LORD All the days of my life, To behold the beauty of the LORD, And to inquire in His temple.
For (Ps. 31:20; 91:1) in the time of trouble He shall hide me in His pavilion; In the secret place of His tabernacle He shall hide me; He shall (Ps. 40:2) set me high upon a rock.
And now (Ps. 3:3) my head shall be lifted up above my enemies all around me; Therefore I will offer sacrifices of joy in His tabernacle; I will sing, yes, I will sing praises to the LORD.
Hear, O LORD, when I cry with my voice! Have mercy also upon me, and answer me.
When You said, “Seek My face,” My heart said to You, “Your face, LORD, I will seek.”
(Ps. 69:17; 143:7) Do not hide Your face from me; Do not turn Your servant away in anger; You have been my help; Do not leave me nor forsake me, O God of my salvation.
(Is. 49:15) When my father and my mother forsake me, Then the LORD will take care of me.
(Ps. 25:4; 86:11; 119:33) Teach me Your way, O LORD, And lead me in a smooth path, because of my enemies.
Do not deliver me to the will of my adversaries; For (Deut. 19:18; Ps. 35:11; Matt. 26:60; Mark 14:56; John 19:33) false witnesses have risen against me, And such as breathe out violence.
I would have lost heart, unless I had believed That I would see the goodness of the LORD (Job 28:13; Ps. 52:5; 116:9; 142:5; Is. 38:11; Jer. 11:19; Ezek. 26:20) In the land of the living.
(Ps. 25:3; 37:34; 40:1; 62:5; 130:5; Prov. 20:22; Is. 25:9; (Hab. 2:3)) Wait on the LORD; Be of good courage, And He shall strengthen your heart; Wait, I say, on the LORD!
